review: I am lovin my Fire TV Stick!!  Easy to install without any assistance from my husband!  :)
author: LYNDA WAGNER

review: Didn't work. Kept losing connection. Bought a new faster router to insure speed was adequate.
author: JoysInSD

review: Very happy with this product.  So simple to set up and use.  Works exactly as advertised.  Voice command app on phone/tablet works equally as well.
author: Kman

review: I love this thing.  Small, fast, and easy set up.  ONLY reason it didn't get 5 stars is because of no youtube.com.  Youtube would make this thing the best on the market today, IMO.  Nice smooth UI and visually pleasing.
author: Matt Olsen

review: Please add volume to the software
author: David C

review: Have the cheapest internet service my cable service offers.They told me it wouldnt stream movies.Guess what? YES IT DOES.Lowered my cable to the basic service and I watch Prime movies all the time.Love that I have the fire stick on my TV,phone and chromebook.Set up took minutes.
author: Nan

review: Xmbc/Kodi. Only media stick that you can put it on and makes all the difference in the world
author: Michael

review: nothing to show how to connect to the actual movies ect
